website_summaries.verdict: Integrated subwoofer and a low price make this soundbar a can’t miss add-on for any television.
pros: This affordable yet potent soundbar makes use of a built-in mini subwoofer for robust bass capabilities without the need for a bulky external unit
Bluetooth connection makes it a musical extension of your smartphone as well
cons: Bass level is not adjustable through the on-board controls, so your only option is to adjust it through the TV controls

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! It hisses when it's on. And, you can't turn it off!
customer_reviews.text: The thing powers on all by itself and then hisses. If you power it off, it will just turn itself back on within a minute or two and commence with the static hissing noise.It's garbage!
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great value in a sound bar
customer_reviews.text: We added this to a wall mounted 48” TV in our kitchen area. The sound from the TV’s speakers made it difficult to follow dialogue across the room. The addition of this sound bar has greatly improved the clarity and quality of the sound. It was easy to mount to the wall and connect it to the TV via an optical cable. I also programmed my cable/TV remote to operate the volume. Overall the performance from this sound bar is impressive. The bass is more than sufficient for our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: treadmark

customer_reviews.title: Clear dialogue
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Specifically gas a dialogue setting that actually works! Allows for pretty much anything I've watched so far to have noticeably clearer dialogue!!!
customer_reviews.author: StewK

customer_reviews.title: hissing noise is intolerable
customer_reviews.text: the first one i got was defective and couldn't even be plugged in. the replacement makes a terrible noise when not in use. remote is annoying, volume control is mysterious.
customer_reviews.author: J Feindel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Deliver for the Klipsch Brand
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not up to par for the Klipsch brand. The soundbar is mainly a treble and mid-tone range only. The surround sound is more of an echo. The soundbar will turn on by itself when you switch to different channels. There's also no way to know how loud the soundbar is because there is not a digital display. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legit virtual surround sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a skeptic about virtual surround sound, but this sound bar has maybe me a believer. I have it connected to a 55 inch Sony Bravia via optical line and at first the sound quality was only marginally better than the TV. Once I turned on the surround sound the room was filled with sound coming from front, left, right and surprising from behind. It claims to have an internal subwoofer and it does okay, for a sound bar but still lacking for my preference. I have a Polk sub connected to the TV via the headphone connection for true room shaking bass. After some volume adjustments I am very happy with the Klipsch RSB-3 sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: An Affordably Solid SOUND Solution
customer_reviews.text: I like the fidelity and clarity of sound. The enclosure is stylishly compact and fits well with other components. This system fills my bedroom as well as my previous system of amplifier, sub woofer and wired bookshelf 🔊s. The price is nice too. Happily, I find nothing not to like about this purchase. Klipsch thought of everything and put it into this package.
customer_reviews.author: Broderick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too large for my counter
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality and the control and the options it offered, just too long to fit into the space in front of my TV. Also too much trouble to move around... Minus one star. Otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: The MKY

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch.
customer_reviews.text: It's Klipsch. Tried and true. If you simply cannot have bigger Klipsch or a separate sub like me living on the 2nd level and caring about those below me, this is the best solution.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It’s the fact
customer_reviews.text: What is not loud enough or clear enough for a guy that’s pretty badly hard of hearing . I have already gotten rid of the unit and bought the next biggest one with a sub

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound/features at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Surround sound feature and built in subwoofer offer great sound. The dialogue feature is great for bringing commentator voices above crowds in sports events. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Please send me the cable that was to be included in the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this product as excellent except that when it arrived, the optical cable was missing. I borrowed one from my son and it works fine. Only problem is he needs the cable returned to him. So, could Amazon send me the appropriate cable and I would resubmit a new review as the sound bar is perfect for both of us seniors that are hard of hearing. The value would have been great if the cable had been included!!
customer_reviews.author: bob wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch is always quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you have to turn surround sound settings off to hear properly. Simple and loud. 10/10.

customer_reviews.title: Does what I wanted

customer_reviews.text: Needs an led readout of volume level. Sound is ok but for the money, I think you can do better.

customer_reviews.text: Has excellent sound for bedroom tv. I put it on my headboard and it's perfect for late night tv also.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth didn't work and it didn't come with the cable it indicated it would have. Horrible customer service - wouldn't pay for shipping return costs even though the item was defective. So, beware!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I thought I installed this wrong at first since I could barely hear anything coming out of it. This is a poor excuse for a soundbar unfortunately. From the inadequate instructions, sound, all the way to the tiny remote which you can't really control much of anything. I really cannot point out any positives except that it comes with a digital sound cable. The instructions are pictures with no written explanation of what the features are. I have another soundbar by Samsung that comes with a Sub-woofer that in comparison with this one makes my other room sound like a HD movie theater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is so easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to set up and use, the sound that comes through is noticeably better than my TV's sound. It has two settings, one emphasizing dialogue, the other for background sound so you can alternate depending on what you're watching. The bar itself is sturdy but inconspicuous once placed in front of the TV, like mine is. My stand is black so it blends right in.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Clear and better sound then the Bose
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect!! Perfect clear sound and the bass isn't too bad. Love the face the sub is built in. No box on the floor. Great sound bar. I use it in my master bedroom. Thank you Klipsch!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike
